prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric plant creature with vibrant colors.

Generate a Pokemon with a slimy body and long, flowing appendages.
Make a creature that thrives in wetlands, with distinctive pink features.

Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of ancient flora and fauna.
